document_data.mainbody:
Dungeons & Dragons Saturday Morning Adventures #1 is an upcoming comic published by IDW Publishing and the first issue of a five-issue comic series set in the Forgotten Realms.
Dungeons & Dragons Saturday Morning Adventures 1 Cover B.jpg|Cover B
Dungeons & Dragons Saturday Morning Adventures 1 Cover Incentive Variant.jpg|Retailer Incentive Variant Cover
